channel.title: Cache downloading problem
channel.description: ok after the cache has finished downloading and you close the client and then re-open it you will get connection error retrying in ... even though you already have the cache any ideas?

item.title: Cache downloading problem
item.dc:creator: @turmoil-pk turmoil-pk
item.description:
@turmoil-pk wrote:

you made a thread needing help and your calling me for something which is almost the same problem? you idiot and it’s not that the cache is packed wrong either because i’ve checked over the cache multiple times and i’m not trying to act smart sorry about that …

it loads perfect and you can play ok just untill you close client/webclient then you have to delete and re-download

Read full topic
